commit.message:
tree.c (valid_machine_attribute): Only create a new type variant if there is a decl to use it.

* tree.c (valid_machine_attribute): Only create a new type variant if
there is a decl to use it.

From-SVN: r21247

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+	there is a decl to use it.
